Fitted fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. The jacket has a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and thumbholes at the cuffs. Unlined.

Pleated mesh dress that is transparent at the top with a small frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a double-layered skirt. Lined.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back and scalloped hem. Lined.
Small bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 6x15x19 cm.
Trousers in stretch cotton velvet with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly and fake button at the waist, fake front pockets  and real back pockets.
Trousers in stretch cotton velvet with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly and fake button at the waist, fake front pockets  and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved jersey T-shirt with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Loose-knit jumper in a nylon blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.

Jersey sports top in a stretch cotton blend with taped details. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a rounded hem and reflective details. Zipped pocket on one side and a high zip on the other. Slightly longer at the back.

Jersey sports top in a stretch cotton blend with taped details. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a rounded hem and reflective details. Zipped pocket on one side and a high zip on the other. Slightly longer at the back.

T-shirt in soft jersey made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a print motif on the front and a ribbed neckline.
Blouse in a viscose weave with long sleeves and a wrapover front with pleats and concealed press-studs.
Glasses with metal and plastic frames and clear lenses.
Shorter shorts in woven fabric with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and slightly wider legs.
Hair scarf in an airy, patterned weave that can be tied around the head or neck. Size 16x22 cm.

Joggers in light sweatshirt fabric. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Sports jacket in sturdy, double-layer jersey with a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, a drawstring at the hem and ribbing at the cuffs. Narrow elastication at the hem and reflective details. Unlined. Size of chest pocket 14x26cm.
Short, fitted dress in cotton jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Straight-cut jersey dress in a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Front pockets and slits in the sides of the hem.
Straight-cut jersey dress in a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Front pockets and slits in the sides of the hem.
Knee-length skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a concealed zip at the side, side pockets and a tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Top in a cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tie at the top, gathered seam at the waist, zip in the side and a flare to the hem.
Satin hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Satin hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
